mapper.sql: project_id, project_name, area_id, project_contact_user_id, project_create_user_id, project_owner_contact, project_owner_contact_tel, project_status, project_create_time, project_update_time, project_logo, project_topic_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from project
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into project ( project_name, area_id, project_contact_user_id, project_create_user_id, project_owner_contact, project_owner_contact_tel, project_status, project_topic_status, project_logo ) values ( #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectContactUser.userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectCreateUser.userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectOwnerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectOwnerContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{projectTopicStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{projectLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update project
project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_name = #{record.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{record.areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_contact_user_id = #{record.projectContactUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_create_user_id = #{record.projectCreateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update project set project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{record.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{record.areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_contact_user_id = #{record.projectContactUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_create_user_id = #{record.projectCreateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_owner_contact = #{record.projectOwnerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_owner_contact_tel = #{record.projectOwnerContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_status = #{record.projectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, project_create_time = #{record.projectCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_update_time = #{record.projectUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_logo = #{record.projectLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_topic_status = #{record.projectTopicStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_contact_user_id = #{projectContactUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_create_user_id = #{projectCreateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_owner_contact = #{projectOwnerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_owner_contact_tel = #{projectOwnerContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
project_create_time = #{projectCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_update_time = #{projectUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_logo = #{projectLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_topic_status = #{projectTopicStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_contact_user_id = #{projectContactUser.userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_owner_contact = #{projectOwnerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_owner_contact_tel = #{projectOwnerContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p.*,area.ID,area.NAME aname, projectContactUser.userid contactuserid,projectContactUser.name contactname, projectCreateUser.userid createuserid,projectCreateUser.name createusername from project p LEFT JOIN area area ON p.area_id = area.ID LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user projectContactUser ON p.project_contact_user_id = projectContactUser.userid LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user projectCreateUser ON p.project_create_user_id = projectCreateUser.userid WHERE p.project_status = #{projectStatus} and p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{projectName},'%') and projectContactUser.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{projectContactUser.name},'%') and p.project_owner_contact LIKE CONCAT('%',#{projectOwnerContact},'%') and p.project_owner_contact_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{projectOwnerContactTel},'%')

select p.*,area.ID,area.NAME aname, projectContactUser.userid contactuserid,projectContactUser.name contactname, projectCreateUser.userid createuserid,projectCreateUser.name createusername from project p LEFT JOIN area area ON p.area_id = area.ID LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user projectContactUser ON p.project_contact_user_id = projectContactUser.userid LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user projectCreateUser ON p.project_create_user_id = projectCreateUser.userid where p.project_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.project_status = #{statusId,jdbcType=TINYINT}
